title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Enhancement Workshop in Blended and Virtual Learning Environments: Science

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement writing skills to accurately express scientific concepts in Korean with over 80% accuracy
Learners will complete three practical tasks translating scientific abstracts into approximately 500 characters and incorporate feedback
Learners acquire methods to evaluate clarity of expression and academic appropriateness using a 5-point scale through peer assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
